title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.25 - Responsibility for injuries and damage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.25 - Responsibility for injuries and damage

State Regulations

Any person causing any damage to Port Authority property
shall be required to pay to the Port Authority on demand the full cost of
repairs, or to reimburse the Port Authority for the full amount of the
damage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
